page.title: 08WIZARDWOOD KENNELS & CATTERY
page.content: Then Wizardwood kennels and cattery provides a service for people who want their cats and dogs looking after whilst they are on holiday. The kennels can house upto 16 dogs and 20 cats and people can have them looked after for as long as they wish. The centre is run by a family who also have an interest in breeding and showing their own high pedigree dogs. They currently have 10 such animals. Any dog staying at the kennels can expect to have two runs a day. Because of its rural setting the dogs have no shortage of space and are often walked in nearby fields. The animals are fed once daily, in the afternoon, and are generally given what their owner recommends.
